doc.title: The Peramakan Makan Session: Power Peranakan!
doc.text: Photos/JJ by/IN Cactuskit/NN I/PRP ca/MD n't/RB speak/VB for/IN the/DT rest/NN ,/, but/CC last/JJ Saturday/NN 's/POS Makan/NN Session/NN at/IN Peramakan/NN was/VBD probably/RB my/PRP$ best/JJ Peranakan/NN meal/NN ever/RB ./. The/DT food/NN was/VBD great/JJ and/CC the/DT Tok/NNP Panjang/NNP -LRB-/NNP Long/NNP Table/NNP -RRB-/NNP was/VBD very/RB Panjang/JJ !/. -LRB-/JJ Long/NN -RRB-/NN ./. Not/RB only/RB was/VBD the/DT food/NN excellent/NN ,/, but/CC there/RB were/VBD so/RB many/JJ new/JJ Nonya/NN dishes/NNS that/WDT I/PRP have/VBN never/RB tried/VBD before/IN !/. -LRB-/. I/PRP do/VBP n't/RB have/VB the/DT privilege/NN of/IN having/VBG a/DT Nonya/JJ Grandma/NN -RRB-/NN ./. In/IN fact/NN ,/, even/RB some/DT of/IN the/DT Peranakan/JJ kakis/NNS went/VBD home/NN determined/NN to/TO find/VB out/IN more/NN about/IN certain/JJ dishes/NNS from/IN their/PRP$ Grandmothers/NN and/CC why/WRB they/PRP never/RB cooked/VBN it/PRP for/IN them/PRP !/. One/CD of/IN the/DT fast/RB disappearing/JJ dishes/NNS which/WRB I/PRP personally/VB found/VBD to/TO be/VB a/DT Umami/JJ Bomb/NN was/VBD the/DT Babi/NN Toh/NN Hay/NN ./. This/DT is/VBZ a/DT seasonal/JJ dish/NN because/IN the/DT marinade/NN is/VBZ made/VBD from/IN Udang/NNP Bubok/NNP which/WDT is/VBZ only/RB available/JJ for/IN a/DT few/JJ months/NNS of/IN the/DT year/NN ./. Udang/JJ Bubok/NN is/VBZ a/DT tiny/JJ shrimp/NN -LRB-/NN smaller/NN than/IN Chinchalok/JJ -RRB-/NN which/WDT is/VBZ fermented/RB in/IN wine/JJ and/CC red/JJ yeast/NN ./. The/DT taste/NN is/VBZ very/RB unique/JJ and/CC it/PRP is/VBZ one/CD of/IN those/DT dishes/NNS which/WDT makes/VBZ you/PRP want/VB to/TO eat/VB a/DT lot/NN of/IN rice/NN ./. This/DT dish/NN was/VBD made/VBD specially/RB for/IN our/PRP$ makan/NN session/NN and/CC is/VBZ not/RB usually/RB found/VBD in/IN Peranakan/NN restaurants/NN ./. I/PRP have/VB asked/VBD Bibik/NN Katherine/NN to/TO include/VB this/DT particular/JJ dish/NN on/IN their/PRP$ menu/NN for/IN the/DT month/NN of/IN April/NN at/IN least/RB so/RB that/IN our/JJ readers/NNS might/VB have/VB the/DT opportunity/NN to/TO go/VB down/VB to/TO try/VB it/PRP ./. 4.75/DT \//JJ 5/CD The/DT Hati/NN Babi/NN Bungkus/NN was/VBD another/JJ dish/NN that/WDT was/VBD new/JJ to/TO me/PRP ./. This/DT is/VBZ made/VBD from/IN pork/NN liver/NN and/CC meat/NN ,/, marinated/VBD with/IN spices/NNS and/CC wrapped/VBD in/IN Peng/NNP Seh/NNP -LRB-/NNP omentum/NNP -RRB-/NN and/CC deep/VB fried/VBD ./. I/PRP never/RB liked/VBD liver/NN but/CC they/PRP have/VBP managed/VBN to/TO make/VB it/PRP so/RB that/IN you/PRP do/VBP n't/RB have/VB that/IN porky/NN smell/NN and/CC it/PRP was/VBD excellent/JJ ./. I/PRP think/VB all/DT of/IN the/DT dishes/NNS were/VBD well/RB worth/IN recommending/VBG ,/, but/CC I/PRP want/VB to/TO highlight/VB just/RB one/CD more/NN dish/NN which/WDT is/VBZ the/DT Itek/NNP Sio/NNP -LRB-/NNP Duck/NNP -RRB-/NNP ./. This/DT was/VBD the/DT best/JJS Itek/NN Sio/. I/PRP had/VBD ever/RB ./. It/PRP was/VBD tender/JJ and/CC prepared/VBD in/IN a/DT way/NN that/IN you/PRP do/VBP n't/RB have/VB the/DT gamey/JJ flavor/NN of/IN the/DT duck/NN ,/, yet/RB very/RB flavourful/JJ ./. 4.5/DT \//JJ 5/CD As/CC if/IN the/DT 10/CD dishes/NNS were/VBD not/RB enough/JJ ,/, we/PRP were/VBD treated/JJ to/TO 4/CD desserts/NNS including/IN the/DT Rempah/JJ Udang/NN which/WDT was/VBD the/DT favorite/NN dessert/NN of/IN the/DT Chor/NNP Chor/NNP in/IN the/DT TV/NNP series/NNP ``/NNP Little/NNP Nonya/NNP ''/NNP ./. A/DT lot/NN of/IN kakis/NNS remarked/VBD that/IN they/PRP never/RB expected/VBN that/IN Rempah/NN Udang/NN would/MD be/VB a/DT sweet/JJ dish/NN as/IN the/DT ones/NNS they/PRP buy/VB outside/VB all/DT tend/NN to/TO be/VB spicy/JJ and/CC savoury/JJ ./. But/CC in/IN fact/NN Rempah/NN Udang/NN is/VBZ supposed/JJ to/TO be/VB a/DT dessert/NN and/CC the/DT ones/NNS that/WDT you/PRP get/VB normally/RB is/VBZ the/DT Nasi/NNP Pangang/NNP ./. The/DT Rempah/NN Udang/IN last/JJ Sat/NN was/VBD excellent/JJ !/. 4.5/DT \//JJ 5/CD Here/RB 's/POS the/DT video/NN recipe/NN of/IN the/DT Rempah/JJ Udang/NN which/WDT I/PRP filmed/VBD with/IN Bibik/NN Katherine/NN last/JJ year/NN ./. Many/JJ thanks/NNS to/TO everyone/VB who/WP turned/VBD up/RP for/IN the/DT makan/NN session/NN !/. It/PRP is/VBZ because/IN of/IN your/PRP$ support/NN that/WDT we/PRP are/VBP able/JJ to/TO organize/VB these/DT sessions/NN !/. Thanks/JJ especially/RB to/TO Kelvin/VB and/CC Bibik/JJ Katherine/NN for/IN hosting/IN the/DT session/NN and/CC working/VBG with/IN us/PRP to/TO raise/VB $/$ 1230/CD towards/IN the/DT ieatishootipost/NN social/NN project/NN for/IN the/DT year/NN ,/, which/WDT is/VBZ the/DT Goducate/JJ van/NN for/IN the/DT impoverish/JJ kids/NNS living/VBD in/IN Sandakan/NN ./.
